quest: Hey, welcome to your first shift. I'll be out of the house for just a couple of hours so I just need you to monitor the place until I'm back. Do you think you can handle that?
Fantastic! I'll leave the lights on so you can see through the cameras better. I'll be back at 5pm! I left you a bag of cheetos on the table, feel free to help yourself!
Aww, you'll be fine, my friend. There's nothing in the place worth stealing, I just like having a little extra security around for peace of mind.
If anything comes up, just ring the alarm and I'll contact you immediately. By the way, do you like Cheetos?
Great. I freaking love Cheetos. I'll make sure to bring enough for the both of us own my way back from the grocery store. I'll talk to you later!
What? Cheetos are great, dude. Alright, I'll talk to you later.
Oh my god, look at this pic of this dog! Isn't he adorable?
I know, right? Haha! I'll be back very soon!
I'm connected to the security monitor now. Show me what's up!
Hahahaha! Oh thank god, that's just my cat, Waffles. That's my fault, I really should've told you about her. Thanks for ringing the alarm anyways, better safe than sorry, am I right?
Glad we're on the same page. Anyways, I'm almost back, so you're good for today. Thanks for everything, you can head home now!
Hey, I'd rather a bunch of false alarms than actually having my house broken into, haha. I'm almost back, so go ahead and head home for the day.
